mods.abstract: General view of Thebes with Colossi of Memnon and Rameseum in the distance (New Kingdom Dynasty XVIII & XIX); excavation site and building complex (bottom middle) Rameseum and Colossi of Memnon (middle of left side); "989. Thebes. vue generale. P. Dittrich" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
